hints.content:
First, let's find the area and perimeter of the first rectangle.  

[[☃ image 1]]

We can find the area of a rectangle by multiplying its length by its width.  
Area $= \greenD6 \times \greenD4 = \greenD{24} \text{ sq cm}$ 

We find the perimeter by adding the lengths of the sides.  
Perimeter $= \greenD6 + \greenD6 + \greenD4 + \greenD4 = \greenD{20} \text{ cm}$
